prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a sleek black body and vibrant green accents.
I want a mythical creature that has a powerful presence and can control nature.
Generate a Pokemon with multiple forms, showcasing its ability to adapt to environments.
Make a legendary Pokemon that embodies the balance of ecosystems with a unique color palette.
Imagine a Pokemon that can transform into different shapes, representing evolution and power.
Design a creature that feels both ancient and modern, with intricate details on its body.
Show me a Pokemon with a majestic aura that thrives in diverse habitats across the world.
